column5: I need to get my Mercury 15hp outboard serviced in the GTA. It is a 2 stroke circa 1996.  Just wondering if any of you had any recommendations on businesses with good service and prices.  I need a new impeller and I have an issue with a water leak in the engine.  Any recommendations, thoughts or questions please post.  Thanks again,  Nemo
I usually goto city marine for all my parts,  its on the queensway in etobicoke, near the 427.  416-207-0344.  No idea on there labour costs and stuff as i usually do the labour part.
Leisure Marine Warehouse 5781 Hwy. 7 Woodbridge ONTARIO L4L 1T7 CANADA Phone: 905-851-3903 Fax: 905-851-4423

CITY MARINE hands down!!!! My '91 Merc 115 runs like a top.  http://www.citymarinetoronto.com/  Check out all the mechanics training certificates on the wall. All current.  Tell David/Linda that Simon sent you.  ps. If you're entertaining any marine mechanics in the Burlington area, be sure to pm me. There is one company there that you definitely want to stay away from.
http://www.discountrvmarine.com/  Bill is a good guy to deal with if you're looking for something north of the 401.
Thanks for all the recommendations guys. I went with Discount Marine in Maple as it is closer.  I will let you know how it turns out...  Nemo
Please do!,any shop close to the highway with good pricing works for me..I also do the labour myself.
